--- title: LS 빅데이터 스쿨 Homework 2 author: Jinii date: '2024-07-16' categories: - bigdata --- ## p. 144 mpg 데이터를 이용해 분석 문제를 해결해 보세요. ## Q1 ::: {#24a31ed2 .cell execution_count=1} ``` {.python .cell-code} import pandas as pd import numpy as np mpg = pd.read_csv('mpg.csv') mpg mpg_d4 = mpg.query('displ <= 4') mpg_d5 = mpg.query('displ >= 5') mpg_d4['hwy'].mean() mpg_d5['hwy'].mean() ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display execution_count=1} ``` np.float64(18.07894736842105) ``` ::: ::: ## Q2 ::: {#6ef34961 .cell execution_count=2} ``` {.python .cell-code} mpg_audi = mpg.query('manufacturer == "audi"') mpg_toyota = mpg.query('manufacturer == "toyota"') mpg_audi['cty'].mean() mpg_toyota['cty'].mean() ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display execution_count=2} ``` np.float64(18.529411764705884) ``` ::: ::: ## Q3 ::: {#579d314b .cell execution_count=3} ``` {.python .cell-code} mpg.query('manufacturer in ["chevrolet", "ford", "honda"]')['hwy'].mean() ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display execution_count=3} ``` np.float64(22.50943396226415) ``` ::: ::: ## p. 153 ## Q1 ::: {#c6320274 .cell execution_count=4} ``` {.python .cell-code} mpg.query('manufacturer == "audi"').sort_values(['hwy'], ascending = False).head() ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display execution_count=4} ```{=html}
manufacturer model displ year cyl trans drv cty hwy fl category
2 audi a4 2.0 2008 4 manual(m6) f 20 31 p compact
3 audi a4 2.0 2008 4 auto(av) f 21 30 p compact
1 audi a4 1.8 1999 4 manual(m5) f 21 29 p compact
0 audi a4 1.8 1999 4 auto(l5) f 18 29 p compact
9 audi a4 quattro 2.0 2008 4 manual(m6) 4 20 28 p compact
``` ::: ::: ## p. 158 ## Q1 ::: {#ad4d92cd .cell execution_count=5} ``` {.python .cell-code} mpg_new = mpg.copy() mpg_new = mpg_new.assign(total = mpg_new['cty'] + mpg_new['hwy']) ``` ::: ## Q2 ::: {#db83cb58 .cell execution_count=6} ``` {.python .cell-code} mpg_new = mpg_new.assign(mean = mpg_new['total'] / 2) ``` ::: ## Q3 ::: {#7a730421 .cell execution_count=7} ``` {.python .cell-code} mpg_new.sort_values('mean', ascending = False).head(3) ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display execution_count=7} ```{=html}
manufacturer model displ year cyl trans drv cty hwy fl category total mean
221 volkswagen new beetle 1.9 1999 4 manual(m5) f 35 44 d subcompact 79 39.5
212 volkswagen jetta 1.9 1999 4 manual(m5) f 33 44 d compact 77 38.5
222 volkswagen new beetle 1.9 1999 4 auto(l4) f 29 41 d subcompact 70 35.0
``` ::: ::: ## Q4 ::: {#e4632b6d .cell execution_count=8} ``` {.python .cell-code} mpg.assign(total = lambda x: x['cty'] + x['hwy'], mean = lambda x: x['total'] / 2) \ .sort_values('mean', ascending = False)\ .head(3) ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display execution_count=8} ```{=html}
manufacturer model displ year cyl trans drv cty hwy fl category total mean
221 volkswagen new beetle 1.9 1999 4 manual(m5) f 35 44 d subcompact 79 39.5
212 volkswagen jetta 1.9 1999 4 manual(m5) f 33 44 d compact 77 38.5
222 volkswagen new beetle 1.9 1999 4 auto(l4) f 29 41 d subcompact 70 35.0
``` ::: :::
